# type x y extra_settings per object type
# type: 0 = Mario , 1 = Brick, 2 = Goomba, 3 = Koopas
# 4: ####, 5: platform, 6: color block,
# 7: ?brick, 8: item
# See OBJECT_TYPE constants in AssetIDs.h

# NOTE: The item & the brick must match with each other
# coinSetting: 1: inside the brick, 0: not inside the brick
